mapper.sql: fdcId, userId, fdcType, fdcTitle, fdcTime, fdcContext, fdcImage
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM foundcase f,user_info u WHERE f.fdcId = #{fdcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and f.userId = u.userId
SELECT * FROM foundcase f,user_info u WHERE f.fdcType=#{fdcType,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND f.userId = u.userId ORDER BY f.fdcTime DESC
SELECT * FROM foundcase f,user_info u WHERE f.userId=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND f.userId = u.userId ORDER BY f.fdcTime DESC
mapper.insert: insert into foundcase (fdcId, userId,fdcType, fdcTitle, fdcTime, fdcContext, fdcImage) values (#{fdcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fdctype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fdctitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fdccontext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdcimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

fdcId,

update foundcase
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fdcTitle = #{fdctitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fdcTime = #{fdctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

fdcFindAddress = #{fdcfindaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where fdcId = #{fdcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
